code: import*as actionTypes from"../actionTypes";import{User}from"../models/user";import{Word}from"../models/word";export var createUser=function createUser(name){return function(dispatch){var user=new User(name);dispatch({type:actionTypes.CREATE_USER,user:user});};};export var pushWord=function pushWord(word,spelling){return function(dispatch){var wordToAdd=new Word(word,spelling);dispatch({type:actionTypes.PUSH_WORD,word:wordToAdd});};};export var postUser=function postUser(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:actionTypes.POST_USER});};};
